game.name: DCS: UH-1H The Huey Last Show Campaign by SorelRo
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: The Huey Last Show is a story-based campaign that will test your skills as a helicopter pilot, in 15 missions you will be facing various challenges and various missions while confronting the forces of the Soviet Union.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Huey Last Show is a story-based campaign that will test your skills as a helicopter pilot, in 15 missions you will be facing various challenges and various missions while confronting the forces of the Soviet Union.
